amendment.description: To create a deficit-reduction reserve fund that addresses the nonprofit postal discount for State and national political committees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 412 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 412 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 412 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 412 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coburn.
